segments.text: Hi . I need a wake-up call tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What time would you like your wake-up call ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I need two calls , one at 7 and another at 7 fifteen .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That is no problem at all , of course . You'll get a call at 7 o'colock and another at 7 fifteen .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then again , I think 7 fifteen is too early . Change 7 fifteen to 7 thirty , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So , that'll be a call at 7 and another at 7 thirty.Do you have any other requests ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not just now , but if I do think of something later , I'll give you a ring .
segments.speaker: S1
